mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER(ID, PW, NAME, EMAIL, ENABLED) VALUES(#{id}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{email}, 1)
INSERT INTO MEMBER_ROLE VALUES(#{id}, (SELECT NUM FROM ROLE WHERE ROLENAME = 'ROLE_MEMBER'))
mapper.select: SELECT M.*, R.* FROM MEMBER M INNER JOIN MEMBER_ROLE MR ON (M.ID = MR.ID) INNER JOIN ROLE R ON (MR.NUM = R.NUM) WHERE M.ID = #{id} AND M.PW = #{pw}
